GP12vd3343pu:0: vajra uvāca atīva sumukhārādhyo devo viṣṇur urukramaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:1: stutena darśayām āsa viśvarūpaṃ dvijanmanām // Vdha_3,343.1 //
GP12vd3343pu:2: prasādaṃ paramaṃ tasya brūhi bhaktajane mama /
GP12vd3343pu:3: tṛptiṃ brahman na gacchāmi śṛṇvann etat kathāmṛtam // Vdha_3,343.2 //
GP12vd3343pu:4: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca sa vidhijño mahārāja mātaliḥ śakrasārathiḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:5: tasyāsti sadṛśī kanyā guṇakāśīti viśrutā // Vdha_3,343.3 //
GP12vd3343pu:6: mātalir nāradaś caiva anveṣṭuṃ tad vanaṃ (?) purā /
GP12vd3343pu:8: sumukhākhyaṃ dadṛśatus tau gṛhītvā gatāv ubhau /
GP12vd3343pu:9: nāge śakraṃ tataḥ śakrād ayācetāṃ tu tāv ubhau // Vdha_3,343.5 //
GP12vd3343pu:10: sumukhasyābhayaṃ tārkṣyāt tayoḥ śakro dadau varam /
GP12vd3343pu:11: vīryajñas tārkṣyavīryasya sa yayau keśavāntikam // Vdha_3,343.6 //
GP12vd3343pu:13: ājagāma tatas tārkṣyaḥ saroṣaḥ keśavāntikam // Vdha_3,343.7 //
GP12vd3343pu:14: garuḍa uvāca kim avajñāya māṃ kṛṣṇa sumukhe dīyate varaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:15: mama pṛṣṭhagataḥ śatruṃs tvaṃ nihaṃsi ca buddhyase /
GP12vd3343pu:16: kuṭumbābharaṇaṃ śatruṃ pannagaṃ mama rakṣasi // Vdha_3,343.8 //
GP12vd3343pu:17: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca evam uktas tadā tena viṣṇur garuḍam abravīt // Vdha_3,343.9 //
GP12vd3343pu:19: na me śakto jagad voḍhuṃ sakalaṃ vihageśvara /
GP12vd3343pu:21: śaktiś ced asti voḍhuṃ te bhujam ekaṃ vahasva me /
GP12vd3343pu:22: evam uktvā dadau pṛṣṭhe tasya savyaṃ bhujaṃ hariḥ // Vdha_3,343.11 //
GP12vd3343pu:24: klānto dīnaś ca tuṣṭāva deveśaṃ madhusūdanam // Vdha_3,343.12 //
GP12vd3343pu:25: garuḍa uvāca namas te devadeveśa surāsuranamaskṛta /
GP12vd3343pu:28: tvam eva deva trailokyaṃ sadā dhārayase 'nagha // Vdha_3,343.14 //
GP12vd3343pu:29: ātmānam ātmanā deva tvam eva vahase sadā /
GP12vd3343pu:30: yasya te deva sakalaṃ dehe tribhuvanaṃ sthitam // Vdha_3,343.15 //
GP12vd3343pu:31: tasya voḍhuṃ kathaṃ śaktā madvidhā hi sahasraśaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:32: tasmāt prasīda bhagavan mama dhvajanivāsinaḥ // Vdha_3,343.16 //
GP12vd3343pu:33: nāsty antas tava deveśa karmaṇāṃ bhuvanatraye /
GP12vd3343pu:34: kas te kīrtayituṃ śaktaḥ karmāṇy anavaśeṣataḥ // Vdha_3,343.17 //
GP12vd3343pu:35: karmaṇāṃ kīrtanaṃ vā te kā stutiḥ parameśvara /
GP12vd3343pu:36: sarvatra sarvaśaktis tvaṃ prasīda mama śatruhan // Vdha_3,343.18 //
GP12vd3343pu:40: prasīda me namas te 'stu pakṣiṇo dhvajavāsinaḥ // Vdha_3,343.20 //
GP12vd3343pu:41: śrībhagavān uvāca ātmasaṃbhāvanā tārkṣya na kāryā te kadācana /
GP12vd3343pu:42: aham evātmanātmānaṃ vahāmi tvāṃ ca dhāraye // Vdha_3,343.21 //
GP12vd3343pu:43: prītā na ca tvayā bhāryā yad apakṣaḥ kṛto hy asi /
GP12vd3343pu:44: mayā tribhuvanaṃ nyastaṃ tvadartham akhilaṃ bhuje // Vdha_3,343.22 //
GP12vd3343pu:45: tvayā tulyo hi balavāṃl loke 'nyo nāsti kaścana /
GP12vd3343pu:46: yasya dordaṇḍasaṃsparśāj jīvitaṃ na ca nirgatam // Vdha_3,343.23 //
GP12vd3343pu:48: viśeṣavantaḥ pakṣānte bhaviṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ // Vdha_3,343.24 //
GP12vd3343pu:49: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca evam uktaḥ suparṇas tu suparṇān prāptavān punaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:51: evaṃ puruṣavat tārkṣyaḥ stūyamānaś ca śārṅgiṇam /
GP12vd3343pu:52: bhūya eva suparṇa(t)tvaṃ gamito 'tibalaḥ kṛtaḥ // Vdha_3,343.26 //
GP12vd3343pu:54: tasmād rājan vijānīhi tasya dānavavidviṣaḥ // Vdha_3,343.27 //
GP12vd3343pu:55: nāsty adeyaṃ hi bhakteṣu devarājyam api dhruvam /
GP12vd3343pu:57: smṛtamātraḥ sa deveśas tadbhayād vinivartakaḥ // Vdha_3,343.28 //
GP12vd3343pu:59: khagapanṛpatiyāyī vīrasaṃjātavarṇo bhavatu madhuripus te bhaktinamrasya tuṣṭaḥ // Vdha_3,343.29
GP12vd3343pu:60: // iti śrīviṣṇudharmottare tṛtīyakhaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeyavajrasaṃvāde sumukhopākhyānavarṇano nāma
GP12vd3343pu:62: vajra uvāca śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ tvattaḥ prasādaṃ paramaṃ hi yat /
GP12vd3343pu:63: kṛtaṃ bhaktajane tena viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā // Vdha_3,344.1 //
GP12vd3343pu:64: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca hate tribhuvane rājañ śakrasya balinā purā /
GP12vd3343pu:65: jagāma śakraḥ śaraṇaṃ kaśyapaṃ pitaraṃ tataḥ // Vdha_3,344.2 //
GP12vd3343pu:67: tam āha varado brahmā gaccha kaśyapa keśavam // Vdha_3,344.3 //
GP12vd3343pu:69: taṃ ca prārthaya putratve sa te putro bhaviṣyati // Vdha_3,344.4 //
GP12vd3343pu:70: tataḥ sa sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ devarājasya dāsyati /
GP12vd3343pu:71: evaṃ coktaḥ kaśyapas tu sārdhaṃ tridaśapuṅgavaiḥ // Vdha_3,344.5 //
GP12vd3343pu:72: kṣīrābdhiṃ sa tato gatvā dadarśa tapasā harim /
GP12vd3343pu:73: dṛṣṭvā stavena tuṣṭāva tatas tasya tadā hariḥ // Vdha_3,344.6 //
GP12vd3343pu:75: tribhir natais tribhuvanaṃ sarvam ākramya viśvadhṛk // Vdha_3,344.7 //
GP12vd3343pu:76: prādāc chakrāya rājendra baddhvā daityeśvaraṃ balim /
GP12vd3343pu:77: kaśyapena stutas tv evaṃ tasya putratvam āgataḥ // Vdha_3,344.8 //
GP12vd3343pu:78: vajra uvāca stavena yena tuṣṭāva kaśyapo madhusūdanam /
GP12vd3343pu:79: taṃ stavaṃ tvaṃ samācakṣva sarvapāpaharaṃ śivam // Vdha_3,344.9 //
GP12vd3343pu:80: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca śṛṇu rājan stavaṃ puṇyaṃ kaśyapena prakīrtitam /
GP12vd3343pu:82_0: kaśyapa uvāca oṃ namo 'stu te devadeva ekaśṛṅga vṛṣārcita sindhuvṛkṣa vṛṣākape surapa anindita bhadra kapila viṣvaksena dhruva
GP12vd3343pu:82_1: dharma dharmadhvaja vaikuṇṭha vṛṣāvarta anādimadhyanidhana janapriya vṛṣṇija amṛteśaya sanātana tridhāman tridhāma tuṣita
GP12vd3343pu:82_2: dundubhe mahatāṃloka lokanābhe padmanābha viriñca bahurūpa akṣaṇādakṣaya (?)
GP12vd3343pu:83: havyabhuk khaṇḍaparaśo cakra muṇḍakeśa haṃsa mahādakṣiṇa hṛṣīkeśa sūkṣma mahāmunistoma
GP12vd3343pu:84_0: virajastama sarvalokapratiṣṭha śipiviṣṭa atapā agraja dharmaja dharmanābha gabhastinābha candraratha apāpman tvam eva samudravāsa
GP12vd3343pu:84_1: aja ekapāt sahasrarambhita mahāśīrṣa sahasradṛk sahasrapāda ayomukha mahāpuruṣa sahasrabāho sahasramūrte sahasrākṣa sahasraprabhava
GP12vd3343pu:85_0: sarveṣām eva viśvatvam āhuḥ puṣpahāsa paramacaratvam eva vauṣaṭ vaṣaṭkāra svāhā makheṣu bhāgaprāśinaṃ śatadhāraṃ sahasradhāraṃ
GP12vd3343pu:85_1: ca bhūr vā bhuvar vā tvam eva brahmamaya brāhmaṇeya brahmā diśas tvam eva
GP12vd3343pu:86: dyaur asi pṛthivy asi mātariśvāsi hotā potā mantā netā homyahetus tvam evāgrya viśvadhāmnā tvam eva digbhiḥ sragbhāṇḍa ījyo 'si
GP12vd3343pu:88: semiṃdhis (??) tvam eva gatir matimatām asi
GP12vd3343pu:91: param asi srug asi dhātāsi yajño 'si
GP12vd3343pu:94_0: dīkṣāsi dakṣiṇāsi viśvam asi sthavira turāṣāḍ hiraṇyagarbha nārāyaṇa ananta vṛṇasame ādityavarṇa ādityatejāḥ mahāpuruṣa puruṣottama
GP12vd3343pu:94_1: ādideva padmanābha padmahāsa padmaśaya padmākṣa hiraṇyāgrakeśa śukla viśvātman viśvadeva viśvatomukha viśvākhya viśvasaṃbhava
GP12vd3343pu:94_2: viśvabhuk tvam eva bhuvikrama atibhūḥ prabhākara śambhuḥ bh[u]vaḥsvayaṃbhū
GP12vd3343pu:95: bhūtādiḥ mahābhūta viśvaga viśvaṃ tvam eva viśvagoptāsi pavitram asi haviḥ viśvadhāta ūrdhvakarma amṛtattvāgra (??)
GP12vd3343pu:97: agne druhiṇa anantakarman vaśaṃ prāgyaṃ viśvapārśva pārśva tvam eva viśva varārthinas trāhīti
GP12vd3343pu:98: stotreṇa yaḥ kāśyapanirmitena stotraṃ sadā devavarasya kartā /
GP12vd3343pu:99: kālyaṃ śucis tadgatamānasena gantā sa lokān puruṣottamasya //
GP12vd3343pu:100: // iti śrīviṣṇudharmottare tṛtīyakhaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeyavajrasaṃvāde kaśyapastotravarṇano nāma catuś catvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 344 //
GP12vd3343pu:101: vajra uvāca prasādaṃ paramaṃ tasya keśavasya mahātmanaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:102: brūhi bhaktajane mahyaṃ devadevasya cakriṇaḥ // Vdha_3,345.1 //
GP12vd3343pu:103: na hi tṛpyāmy ahaṃ tasya śṛṇvānaḥ śravaṇāmṛtam /
GP12vd3343pu:104: hastatrāṇaprado loke ya ekaḥ patatāṃ nṛṇām // Vdha_3,345.2 //
GP12vd3343pu:105: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca devāś ca ṛṣayaś caiva vivadantaḥ purānagha /
GP12vd3343pu:106: bījair yaṣṭavyam ity etat trivarṣaparamoṣitaiḥ // Vdha_3,345.3 //
GP12vd3343pu:108: pakṣo 'yam āsīd dharmajña ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām // Vdha_3,345.4 //
GP12vd3343pu:109: devānāṃ tu paśuḥ pakṣas tato mārgāgato [']bhavat /
GP12vd3343pu:110: rājoparicaro nāma vasur vasumatāṃ varaḥ // Vdha_3,345.5 //
GP12vd3343pu:111: devāś ca ṛṣayaś caiva papṛcchantas tadā vasum /
GP12vd3343pu:112: yathopanītair yaṣṭavyam ity uktaṃ vasunā purā // Vdha_3,345.6 //
GP12vd3343pu:116: nidhanārthaṃ matiṃ cakrur devabhaktasya dānavāḥ // Vdha_3,345.8 //
GP12vd3343pu:118: nyavedayaṃs tathā cakraṃ devācārye bṛhaspatau // Vdha_3,345.9 //
GP12vd3343pu:119: bṛhaspatis tato gatvā bhūmer vivaragaṃ nṛpam /
GP12vd3343pu:120: rakṣām adhyāpayām āsa vaiṣṇavīm aparājitām // Vdha_3,345.10 //
GP12vd3343pu:123: adhyāpya taṃ ca rājānam idam āha bṛhaspatiḥ // Vdha_3,345.11 //
GP12vd3343pu:124: bṛhaspatir uvāca ihastho bhokṣyase rājan vasor dhārāṃ hutāṃ dvijaiḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:125: devatānāṃ prasādena tayā cāpyāyitaḥ sadā // Vdha_3,345.12 //
GP12vd3343pu:126: vidyayā cānayā rājann avadhyas tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi /
GP12vd3343pu:128: evam uktvā sa rājānaṃ tatraivāntaradhīyata // Vdha_3,345.13 //
GP12vd3343pu:129: vajra uvāca rakṣāṃ tu tāṃ me kathaya dvijendra kṛtā tu yā devapurohitena /
GP12vd3343pu:130: rājño vasor bhūmibilasthitasya rakṣā hi sāgryā paramā matā me //
GP12vd3343pu:131: // iti śrīviṣṇudharmottare tṛ[tīye] kha[ṇḍe] mārkaṇḍeyavajrasaṃvāde bhūvivarasthitarājño rakṣāvarṇano nāma pañcacatvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 3.345 //
GP12vd3343pu:132: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya /
GP12vd3343pu:154: namo 'stu te namo 'stu te namo 'stu te /
GP12vd3343pu:155_1: hana paca paca matha matha vidhvaṃsaya vidhvaṃsaya vidrāvaya vidrāvaya śaṅkhena cakreṇa vajreṇa gadayā musalena halena bhasmīkuru
GP12vd3343pu:187: ya imām aparājitāṃ paramavaiṣṇavīṃ siddhāṃ mahāvidyāṃ japati paṭati śṛṇoti smarati dhārayati kīrtayati vā na tasyāgnivāyuvajropalāśani..(?)[bh]ayam
GP12vd3343pu:188: na samudrabhayam na grahabhayam na caurabhayam śvāpadabhayaṃ vā na bhavet /
GP12vd3343pu:191: tad yathā oṃ namo 'stu te anaghe /
GP12vd3343pu:223: sthalagataṃ jalagatam antarikṣagataṃ vā rakṣa rakṣa sarvabhūtebhyaḥ sarvopadravebhyaḥ svāhā
GP12vd3343pu:224: yasyāḥ praṇaśyate puṣpaṃ garbho vā patate yadi /
GP12vd3343pu:225: mriyante bālakā yasyāḥ kākavandhyā ca yā bhavet // Vdha_3,346.1 //
GP12vd3343pu:226: śastraṃ dhārayate hy eṣāṃ samare kāṇḍadāruṇi /
GP12vd3343pu:229: tad yathā hana hana kālaṃ sara sara
GP12vd3343pu:230: gauri gauri dhama dhama vidye alitāle (?)
GP12vd3343pu:231: māle gandhe bandhe paca paca vidye nāśaya vā saṃhara duḥsvapnaṃ vināśaya /
GP12vd3343pu:250: oṃ drauṃdrauṃ jroṃjroṃ kroṃkroṃ turu turu yeṣāṃ dviṣanti pratyakṣaṃ paro[']kṣaṃ vā sarvān dama dama marda marda tāpaya tāpaya gopaya gopaya utsādaya utsādaya /
GP12vd3343pu:288: yathāmanīṣitaṃ kāryaṃ tan mama sidhyatu svāhā /
GP12vd3343pu:300: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca evaṃ hi kṛtarakṣasya vasudhārām upāśnataḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:304: āgamya vāgbhir ugrābhis tarjayantaś ca te vasum /
GP12vd3343pu:305: nirjaghnur āyudhair bhīmair devapakṣaparaṃ sadā // Vdha_3,346.3 //
GP12vd3343pu:306: na ca te 'sya rujaṃ cakrur na ca tān apy udīkṣitā /
GP12vd3343pu:307: cintayām āsa deveśaṃ manasā madhusūdanam // Vdha_3,346.4 //
GP12vd3343pu:308: tato niṣphalayatnās te dṛṣṭvā tan mahad adbhutam /
GP12vd3343pu:309: jagmuḥ sarve gṛhān eva vilakṣā daityadānavāḥ // Vdha_3,346.5 //
GP12vd3343pu:312: gatvā garuḍa rājānam vasuṃ śīghram ihānaya // Vdha_3,346.6 //
GP12vd3343pu:313: evam uktaḥ sa garuḍo devadevena cakriṇā /
GP12vd3343pu:318: tuṣṭāva garuḍaṃ vāgbhir arthyābhir amitakriyaḥ // Vdha_3,346.9 //
GP12vd3343pu:319: vasur uvāca namasyāmi mahābāhuṃ khagendraṃ harivāhanam /
GP12vd3343pu:324: gajakacchapatāṃ prāptau tāv ubhau vairasaṃyutau // Vdha_3,346.12 //
GP12vd3343pu:327: nakhasthau tau tvayā nītau hatau bhuktau ca pakṣipa /
GP12vd3343pu:330: niṣādīśastato (?) muktas tatrāpi brāhmaṇas tvayā // Vdha_3,346.15 //
GP12vd3343pu:332: śākhā bhinnāḥ sthitā yatra vālakhilyāḥ sahasraśaḥ // Vdha_3,346.16 //
GP12vd3343pu:333: tāṃs tu vaktragatān kṛtvā nakhasthair gajakacchapaiḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:334: nabhasy eva nirālambe sarvataḥ parivāritaḥ // Vdha_3,346.17 //
GP12vd3343pu:335: tvayā jitvā raṇe sarvān devāñ śakrapurogamān /
GP12vd3343pu:336: āhṛtaṃ tu paraṃ somaṃ vahner vāpy atha kāśyapa // Vdha_3,346.18 //
GP12vd3343pu:337: nāgau dṛṣṭiviṣau kṛtvā rajasā bhuvi cakṣuṣoḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:338: jihvāgranityagaṃ bhuñjañ cakre tau devanirmitau // Vdha_3,346.19 //
GP12vd3343pu:339: āhṛtyāpi tvayā somaṃ nītam eva na bhakṣitam /
GP12vd3343pu:340: tena viṣṇor dhvajasthāne vāhanatvaṃ gato hy asi // Vdha_3,346.20 //
GP12vd3343pu:341: tvayā nikṣipya darbheṣu somaṃ nāgāś ca vañcitāḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:342: jahāra sahasā yatra tac chīghraṃ balasūdanaḥ // Vdha_3,346.21 //
GP12vd3343pu:343: yatra jihvā dvidhā bhūtā pannagānāṃ dvijottamāḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:344: vinatā mocitā dāsyāt kaṭvā pūrvaṃ jitā paṇe // Vdha_3,346.22 //
GP12vd3343pu:345: uccaiḥśravās tu kiṃvarṇaḥ śukla ity eva bhāṣatī /
GP12vd3343pu:346: kṛṣṇavālam ahaṃ manye pucchaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva vākchalāt // Vdha_3,346.23 //
GP12vd3343pu:349: tasya pakṣasya devendro yadā nāntaṃ hi dṛṣṭavān /
GP12vd3343pu:350: tadā tava suparṇeti nāma khyātaṃ jagattraye // Vdha_3,346.25 //
GP12vd3343pu:351: tejasā bhāskaraṃ devaṃ javena ca samīraṇam /
GP12vd3343pu:352: na te tulyo mahābhāga nāgapakṣakṣayaṃkara // Vdha_3,346.26 //
GP12vd3343pu:354: kṣipraṃ praṇāśam āyāti tathā sarvabhayāni ca // Vdha_3,346.27 //
GP12vd3343pu:355: svakayā pakṣanāḍyā tvaṃ brahmāṇḍaṃ sakalaṃ vahan /
GP12vd3343pu:356: nopayāsi prabho khedaṃ yathā devo janārdanaḥ // Vdha_3,346.28 //
GP12vd3343pu:357: tvam ṛṣis tvaṃ mahābhāgas tvaṃ devaḥ patageśvaraḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:358: tvaṃ prabhus tapanaprakhyas tvaṃ nas trāṇam anuttamam // Vdha_3,346.29 //
GP12vd3343pu:359: balormimān sādhvaradīnasattvaḥ samṛddhimān duṣprasahas tvam eva /
GP12vd3343pu:360: tapaḥ śrutaṃ sarvam ahīnakīrtir anāgatādīn viṣayāṃś ca vetsi //
GP12vd3343pu:361: tvam uttamaḥ sarvam idaṃ carācaraṃ gabhastibhir bhānur ivāvabhāse /
GP12vd3343pu:362: samākṣipan bhānusutaprabhāṃ muhus tvam antakaḥ sarvam idaṃ dhruvādhruva (?) // Vdha_3,346.31
GP12vd3343pu:363: divākaraḥ parikramati yathā dahan prajās tathā dahasi hutāśanaprabha /
GP12vd3343pu:364: bhayaṃkaraḥ pralaya ivāgnir utthito vināśayaty uragaparivartapāntakṛt (?)
GP12vd3343pu:365: khageśvaraṃ śaraṇam upāgato 'smy ahaṃ mahaujasaṃ vitimirabhragocaram (?) /
GP12vd3343pu:366: mahābalaṃ garuḍam upetya khecaraṃ mahaujasaṃ varadam ajeyam aklamam //
GP12vd3343pu:367: // iti śrīviṣṇudharmottare tṛ[tīye] kha[ṇḍe] mārkaṇḍeyavajrasaṃvāde garuḍastotraṃ nāma
GP12vd3343pu:369: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca stutas tu garuḍo rājñā pṛṣṭhamāro 'py apārthivam /
GP12vd3343pu:370: darśayām āsa devasya viṣṇor amitatejasaḥ // Vdha_3,347.1 //
GP12vd3343pu:372: tuṣṭāva bhaktyā rājendra deveśam aparājitam // Vdha_3,347.2 //
GP12vd3343pu:373: vasur uvāca namas te puṇḍarīkākṣa śaraṇāgatavatsala /
GP12vd3343pu:377: na te viduḥ suragaṇāḥ prabhavaṃ na maharṣayaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:378: ādis tvaṃ sarvadharmāṇām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca jagadguro // Vdha_3,347.5 //
GP12vd3343pu:379: sūkṣmas tvaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo mahadbhyaś ca mahattaraḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:380: dūragas tvaṃ mahābhāga sarveṣām api cāgataḥ // Vdha_3,347.6 //
GP12vd3343pu:383: puruṣas tvaṃ tvam avyaktas tvam ātmā buddhir eva ca /
GP12vd3343pu:384: mahābhūtāni bhagavas tvaṃ tathaivendriyāṇi ca // Vdha_3,347.8 //
GP12vd3343pu:386: ye tvāṃ bhajanti te yānti bhagavan paramāṃ gatim // Vdha_3,347.9 //
GP12vd3343pu:387: jayam anagham ajeyaṃ viśvagaṃ devadevaṃ tridaśaripuvināśe nityam udyuktaśaktim /
GP12vd3343pu:388: dvijasuravaravandyaṃ nāśanaṃ kalmaṣāṇāṃ śaraṇam upagato 'haṃ vāsudevaṃ śaraṇyam // Vdha_3,347.10
GP12vd3343pu:389: // iti viṣṇudharmottare tṛtīyakhaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeyavajrasaṃvāde vāsudevastotraṃ nāma saptacatvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 347 //
GP12vd3343pu:390: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca vasunā vasuveśena vāgminā viṣṇur īḍitaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:391: uvāca prāñjaliṃ prahvaṃ pārthivaṃ purataḥ sthitam // Vdha_3,348.1 //
GP12vd3343pu:392: vāsudeva uvāca nānṛtaṃ nṛpa vaktavyaṃ prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagair api /
GP12vd3343pu:393: dharmapraśno na vaktavyas tathaikena viśeṣataḥ // Vdha_3,348.2 //
GP12vd3343pu:395: durvijñeyās tathā dharmāḥ sūkṣmā rājan duranvayāḥ // Vdha_3,348.3 //
GP12vd3343pu:396: tasmān naikena vaktavyāḥ kadācid api jānatā /
GP12vd3343pu:397: uktvānṛtaṃ mahat prāptaṃ tvayā kṛcchraṃ narādhipa // Vdha_3,348.4 //
GP12vd3343pu:399: mama bhakto 'si satataṃ tena te niṣkṛtiḥ kṛtā // Vdha_3,348.5 //
GP12vd3343pu:400: kālenālpena kalpena yā na śakyā surāsuraiḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:401: gaccha pālaya rājyaṃ tvaṃ tathaivāvicalo bhava // Vdha_3,348.6 //
GP12vd3343pu:403: brāhmaṇo hi mahad bhūtaṃ vijñeyaṃ daivataṃ param // Vdha_3,348.7 //
GP12vd3343pu:404: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca evam uktvā vasuṃ viṣṇus tatraivādarśanaṃ gataḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:405: tārkṣyeṇa sahito rājan vismitaś cābhavad vasuḥ // Vdha_3,348.8 //
GP12vd3343pu:406: rājyaṃ cāvāpa bhūyo 'pi khecaratvaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12vd3343pu:407: tataḥ sabhājitaś cāpi devaiḥ sarvaiḥ samāgataiḥ // Vdha_3,348.9 //
GP12vd3343pu:408: evaṃ sa devena hi bhaktiyukto rasātalastho vasudhādhipeśaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:409: bhayāt sughorāt pravimucya yukto rājyena gatvā nabhasas tathaiva //
GP12vd3343pu:410: // iti viṣṇudharmottare tṛtīyakhaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeyavajrasaṃvāde vasūpākhyānaṃ nāmāṣṭacatvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 348 //
GP12vd3343pu:411: vajra uvāca viśvarūpaṃ samācakṣva devadevasya cakriṇaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:413: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca ekāntabhāvanābhaktair dṛṣṭāni bahuśaḥ purā /
GP12vd3343pu:414: viśvarūpāṇi devasya yāny aśakyāni bhāṣitum // Vdha_3,349.2 //
GP12vd3343pu:416: viśvarūpadharaṃ draṣṭuṃ tāvac chaktir na vidyate // Vdha_3,349.3 //
GP12vd3343pu:417: tatra yad darśitaṃ caiva nāradasya purānagha /
GP12vd3343pu:418: tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi viśvadevena viṣṇunā // Vdha_3,349.4 //
GP12vd3343pu:422: hariḥ kṛṣṇo naraś caiva tathā nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ // Vdha_3,349.6 //
GP12vd3343pu:423: hariḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sthit[au] vṛtte tadā lokāntare kila /
GP12vd3343pu:424: naranārāyaṇau devau tapasy ugre tathā ratau // Vdha_3,349.7 //
GP12vd3343pu:427: dadarśa nāradas tatra tāv ubhau dīptatejasau /
GP12vd3343pu:428: abhivādya gatau devau tayos tu purataḥ sthitaḥ // Vdha_3,349.9 //
GP12vd3343pu:432: dadarśa vighnaṃ kurvāṇau devakarma tathānaghau // Vdha_3,349.11 //
GP12vd3343pu:433: tataḥ kṛtāhnik[au] prāha nāradas tau jagadgurū /
GP12vd3343pu:434: bhavantau jagatāṃ nāthau bhavantau parameśvarau // Vdha_3,349.12 //
GP12vd3343pu:436: bhavadbhyām arcyate kaś ca daive pitrye ca kalpyate // Vdha_3,349.13 //
GP12vd3343pu:437: prakṛtir yā parāsmākaṃ yataḥ sarvasya saṃbhavaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:439: pūjayāmaḥ sadā brahman daive pitrye ca kalpite /
GP12vd3343pu:440: viprān devagurūn gāś ca pitṝṃś caiva jagattraye // Vdha_3,349.15 //
GP12vd3343pu:441: ye 'rcayanty arcayanty eva taṃ devaṃ parameśvaram /
GP12vd3343pu:442: yo 'yam apy arcayed devaṃ tena syāt pūjito hariḥ // Vdha_3,349.16 //
GP12vd3343pu:443: vidhihīnaṃ mahābhāga sa hi sarvagato yataḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:444: devasyānyasya yac cārcāṃ kartukāmo 'rcayed dharim // Vdha_3,349.17 //
GP12vd3343pu:445: tena tasya kṛtārcā syād dvijaśreṣṭha vidhānataḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:446: deve yasmāt surāḥ sarvaṃ trailokyam api yad gatam // Vdha_3,349.18 //
GP12vd3343pu:448: nāsti lokeṣu tad brahma yatra nāsti janārdanaḥ // Vdha_3,349.19 //
GP12vd3343pu:449: na tad apy asti lokeṣu yan na viṣṇau pratiṣṭhitam /
GP12vd3343pu:450: yasmin sarvaṃ yataḥ sarvaṃ yaḥ sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yaḥ // Vdha_3,349.20 //
GP12vd3343pu:451: yaś ca sarvamayo nityaṃ tasmai sarvātmane namaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:454: upetāś ca tathā sarve cakrava[r]tyupalakṣaṇaiḥ // Vdha_3,349.22 //
GP12vd3343pu:458: taiḥ sārdhaṃ ramate nityaṃ taiś ca saṃpūjyate sadā // Vdha_3,349.24 //
GP12vd3343pu:460: akāmāś ca jagannātham arcayanti sadā ca ye // Vdha_3,349.25 //
GP12vd3343pu:461: te yānti deham utsṛjya tad dvīpaṃ śvetasaṃjñitam /
GP12vd3343pu:464: pūjayanti hariṃ tatra divyaṃ varṣaśataṃ punaḥ // Vdha_3,349.27 //
GP12vd3343pu:466: brahmaṃs tapobhiḥ pradyumnaṃ tataḥ saṃkarṣaṇaṃ prabhum // Vdha_3,349.28 //
GP12vd3343pu:467: vāsudevaṃ tataḥ prāpya tenaiva sadṛśās tataḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:468: bhavanti sarve sarvatra sarvadā sarvaśaktayaḥ // Vdha_3,349.29 //
GP12vd3343pu:469: muktāś ca sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ paraṃ sukham upāgatāḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:470: sa tvaṃ śīghram ito gatvā śvetadvīpanivāsinaḥ // Vdha_3,349.30 //
GP12vd3343pu:471: paśya tvaṃ puruṣān brahman prasannaḥ sa vibhus tava /
GP12vd3343pu:472: darśayiṣyati rūpaṃ tu trailokyādbhutam adbhutam // Vdha_3,349.31 //
GP12vd3343pu:474: ekataś ca dvitaś caiva tritaś caiva mahātapāḥ // Vdha_3,349.32 //
GP12vd3343pu:475: taṃ tu deśaṃ gatā brahman na tair dṛṣṭo janārdanaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:479: jitaṃ te puṇḍarīkākṣa namas te viśvabhāvana /
GP12vd3343pu:480: namas te 'stu hṛṣīkeśa mahāpuruṣa pūrvaja // Vdha_3,349.35 //
GP12vd3343pu:481: ślokam etaṃ tu te śrutvā śrutavantas tathā giram /
GP12vd3343pu:484: śvetadvīpe gatir nāsti vinā caikāntibhir dvijāḥ // Vdha_3,349.37 //
GP12vd3343pu:486: tapasogreṇa saṃyuktās tena me deśam āgatāḥ // Vdha_3,349.38 //
GP12vd3343pu:487: sāmānyabhaktisattvāś ca punar vrajata mā ciram /
GP12vd3343pu:489: ebhiḥ ślokais tathā dṛṣṭo bhavatīti janārdanaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:490: ekāntabhāvanāsaktaiḥ ślokais tu puruṣair imam // Vdha_3,349.40 //
GP12vd3343pu:491: japtavyaṃ satataṃ viprās tataḥ punar ih[ai]ṣyatha /
GP12vd3343pu:495: ślokam etaṃ paṭhed viprā namaskāre pradakṣiṇe /
GP12vd3343pu:496: snānam etena kartavyaṃ tathā cānte jalaṃ dvijāḥ // Vdha_3,349.43 //
GP12vd3343pu:498: śloka eṣa vinirdiṣṭaḥ sarvakāmapradaḥ śivaḥ // Vdha_3,349.44 //
GP12vd3343pu:499: āpatprāptena japtavyaṃ tan mokṣārthaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12vd3343pu:500: etasya jāpaḥ kartavyo nityam eva vijānatā // Vdha_3,349.45 //
GP12vd3343pu:501: etasya jāpāt puruṣaḥ sarvān kāmān upāśnute /
GP12vd3343pu:502: etāṃ śrutvā tu te vāṇīṃ cāgatā magadhāḥ punaḥ // Vdha_3,349.46 //
GP12vd3343pu:504: yājako yasya dharmātmā devācāryo bṛhaspatiḥ // Vdha_3,349.47 //
GP12vd3343pu:505: adṛśyena hṛto bhāgas tatra devena viṣṇunā /
GP12vd3343pu:506: jagṛhur devatāḥ sarvā dṛśyabhāgāt purodhasaḥ // Vdha_3,349.48 //
GP12vd3343pu:508: ekataś ca dvitaś caiva tritaś caivam avocatam // Vdha_3,349.49 //
GP12vd3343pu:509: adṛśyaḥ sarvadevānāṃ taṃ kathaṃ draṣṭum icchasi /
GP12vd3343pu:510: ity evam anunītas tu devācryo bṛhaspatiḥ // Vdha_3,349.50 //
GP12vd3343pu:511: samāpayām āsa tadā taṃ yajñaṃ pārthivasya ca /
GP12vd3343pu:515: tasmāt taṃ devadeveśaṃ tatrasthaṃ paśya nārada /
GP12vd3343pu:516: tvayāpi devakāryāṇi kartavyāni bahūny atha // Vdha_3,349.53 //
GP12vd3343pu:519: kalpāvasāne tu gatiṃ tāṃ tvaṃ vipra gamiṣyasi // Vdha_3,349.54 //
GP12vd3343pu:520: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca evam uktas tataḥ śīghraṃ manomārutaraṃhasā /
GP12vd3343pu:521: abhivādyātha tau devau taṃ dvīpaṃ nārado gataḥ // Vdha_3,349.55 //
GP12vd3343pu:523: pūjayām āsa śirasā tāṃś ca bhaktyā sa nāradaḥ // Vdha_3,349.56 //
GP12vd3343pu:525: dadarśa tān eva narāñ śvetā[ṃś] candraprabhāñ śubhān // Vdha_3,349.57 //
GP12vd3343pu:526: pūjayām āsa śirasā manasā tais tu pūjitaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:529: stotraṃ jagau sa viśvāya nirguṇāya guṇātmane // Vdha_3,349.59 //
GP12vd3343pu:534: // iti śrīviṣṇudharmottare tṛtīye khaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeyavajrasaṃvāde śrīnāradasya śvetadvīpagamanavarṇano (!) nāmaikonapañcāśadadhitriśatatamo
GP12vd3343pu:714: bhakto 'haṃ tvāṃ didṛkṣur ekāntadarśanāyety oṃ namaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:715: // iti śrīviṣṇudharmottare tṛtīyakhaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeyavajrasaṃvāde śvetadvīpe śrīnāradastotravarṇano nāma pañcāśadadhikatriśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ //
GP12vd3343pu:716: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca sa dadarśa tadā viṣṇuṃ viśvarūpadharaṃ harim /
GP12vd3343pu:725: anirdeśyāni varṇāni tathā bibhrat kvacit kvacit // Vdha_3,351.5 //
GP12vd3343pu:729: grahāṇām atha ṛkṣāṇāṃ rudrāṇāṃ vasubhiḥ saha // Vdha_3,351.7 //
GP12vd3343pu:730: ādityānāṃ samarutāṃ bhṛgūṇāṃ ca tathā dvija /
GP12vd3343pu:731: tathaivāṅgiraso rājan sādhyānām aśvibhiḥ saha // Vdha_3,351.8 //
GP12vd3343pu:736: kānicit tasya saumyāni kānicid bhīṣaṇāni ca /
GP12vd3343pu:737: dadarśa tasya vaktrāṇi śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // Vdha_3,351.11 //
GP12vd3343pu:739: dadarśa sarvataś cāgnīn grasyamānāṃś ca viṣṇunā // Vdha_3,351.12 //
GP12vd3343pu:740: saumyebhyas tasya vaktrebhyo nirgacchantyas tathā prajāḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:741: vāhāṃś ca vividhāṃs tasya sa dadarśātha nāradaḥ // Vdha_3,351.13 //
GP12vd3343pu:743: yuktān nānāvidhair bhāṇḍair āyudhaiś ca sahasraśaḥ // Vdha_3,351.14 //
GP12vd3343pu:745: kecic ca kalaśaṃ ghaṇṭāṃ śaṅkhapadmotpalādibhiḥ // Vdha_3,351.15 //
GP12vd3343pu:749: bījapūrṇākṣamālāś ca pūrṇapātrais tathā paraiḥ // Vdha_3,351.17 //
GP12vd3343pu:750: evaṃ nānāvidhair bhāṇḍaiḥ karāṃs tasya samanvitān /
GP12vd3343pu:753: śirāṃsi dṛṣṭayo hastāṃs tasya devasya dṛṣṭavān // Vdha_3,351.19 //
GP12vd3343pu:754: trailokyaṃ ca T kāye sakalaṃ munisattamaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:757: jagat samagraṃ devasya dehasthaṃ dṛṣṭavān muniḥ // Vdha_3,351.21 //
GP12vd3343pu:758: sa dṛṣṭvā paramaṃ rūpaṃ bhīto hṛṣṭaś ca vismitaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:759: papāta pādayos tasya śirasā sāśrulocanaḥ // Vdha_3,351.22 //
GP12vd3343pu:761: tam uvāca tato devaḥ prahasann ṛṣisattamam // Vdha_3,351.23 //
GP12vd3343pu:762: śrībhagavān uvāca uttiṣṭha mā bhair dharmajña varaṃ vṛṇu yathepsitam /
GP12vd3343pu:763: śrīnārada uvāca nityam ekāntike deva bhaktir bhavatu sā tvayi /
GP12vd3343pu:764: nānyaṃ varaṃ kāmayāmi narāṇām idam uttamam // Vdha_3,351.24 //
GP12vd3343pu:765: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca tam uvāca tato devaḥ praṇatārtiharo hariḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:766: etan nisargasiddhaṃ te yena tvaṃ dṛṣṭavān mama // Vdha_3,351.25 //
GP12vd3343pu:767: viśvarūpam idaṃ brahmann avajñeyaṃ tathā tvayā /
GP12vd3343pu:768: tapas taptaṃ yato vipra mamāpi ca tatas tava // Vdha_3,351.26 //
GP12vd3343pu:769: rūpam etat samāsthāya rūpaṃ svaṃ dvija darśitam /
GP12vd3343pu:770: icchārūpāṇy ahaṃ kuryāṃ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // Vdha_3,351.27 //
GP12vd3343pu:772: mamaiva tāni jānīha matto 'nyan nāsti kiṃcana // Vdha_3,351.28 //
GP12vd3343pu:773: ahaṃ bhūtaṃ ca bhavyaṃ ca vartamānam ahaṃ tathā /
GP12vd3343pu:774: sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva sarvam evāsmi nārada // Vdha_3,351.29 //
GP12vd3343pu:775: sac cāsac cāham evātra tattvam etad bravīmi te /
GP12vd3343pu:778: yaḥ kariṣyati me stotraṃ stotreṇa tvatkṛtena tu // Vdha_3,351.31 //
GP12vd3343pu:779: tasya kāmān vidhāsyāmi ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:780: śvetadvīpe gatis tasya mṛtasya ca bhaviṣyati // Vdha_3,351.32 //
GP12vd3343pu:783: vārāhe tu gate kalpe tato mātsyo bhaviṣyati /
GP12vd3343pu:784: devakāryāṇi kāryāṇi subahūni yatas tvayā // Vdha_3,351.34 //
GP12vd3343pu:786: prādurbhāvāṇi me brahman vyatītāni sahasraśaḥ // Vdha_3,351.35 //
GP12vd3343pu:787: bhaviṣyanti tathānyāni tatra me śṛṇu kānicit /
GP12vd3343pu:790: ahaṃ matsyas tathā kūrmo haṃso 'ham api nārada // Vdha_3,351.37 //
GP12vd3343pu:792: mayāśvaśirasā vedā dānavebhyas tathā hṛtāḥ // Vdha_3,351.38 //
GP12vd3343pu:794: vārāheṇa mayā daityāḥ pātālatalagā hatāḥ // Vdha_3,351.39 //
GP12vd3343pu:796: dānavāś ca hatā yuddhe naranārāyaṇātmanā // Vdha_3,351.40 //
GP12vd3343pu:797: lokottare tathā mārge hariḥ kṛṣṇas tathāpy aham /
GP12vd3343pu:799: vāmanena mayā bhūtvā bales tribhuvanaṃ hṛtam /
GP12vd3343pu:800: tribhiḥ kramaiḥ purā brahman devānāṃ hitakāmyayā // Vdha_3,351.42 //
GP12vd3343pu:802: pṛthvī vasumatī brahman pṛthunā ca mayā kṛtā // Vdha_3,351.43 //
GP12vd3343pu:804: dattātreyeṇa vasudhā devā dvija.gaṇāḥ punaḥ // Vdha_3,351.44 //
GP12vd3343pu:807: dattvā caturdhā putrāṃś ca mayā daśarathasya ca /
GP12vd3343pu:810: meghanādavadhaḥ kāryo lakṣmaṇena tathā mayā // Vdha_3,351.47 //
GP12vd3343pu:811: śatrughnena ca kartavyo lavaṇasya vadhas tathā /
GP12vd3343pu:812: mayā vālmīkinā kāryaṃ kāvyaṃ rāmāyaṇaṃ tathā // Vdha_3,351.48 //
GP12vd3343pu:813: vyāsena vedā vaktavyā ākhyānaṃ bhārataṃ mahat /
GP12vd3343pu:815: pāṇḍoḥ putratvam āsādya pañcadhā ca tathā mayā /
GP12vd3343pu:816: dvidhā ca vasudevasya laghvī kāryā vasuṃdharā // Vdha_3,351.50 //
GP12vd3343pu:818: balabhadreṇa ca mayā hantavyā mauṣṭikādayaḥ // Vdha_3,351.51 //
GP12vd3343pu:820: pradyumnena nihantavyaḥ śambaraś ca mahābalaḥ // Vdha_3,351.52 //
GP12vd3343pu:822: sāmbena yuyudhānena mayā bhūtvā tathaiva ca // Vdha_3,351.53 //
GP12vd3343pu:823: mayā buddhena vaktavyā dharmāḥ kaliyuge punaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:826: ṛṣayaś ca tathā jñeyā mamaivāṃśasamudbhavāḥ // Vdha_3,351.55 //
GP12vd3343pu:827: yad yad vibhūtimat sattvaṃ śrīmadūrjitam eva ca /
GP12vd3343pu:828: tat tad evāvagacches tvaṃ mama tejo'ṃśasaṃbhavam // Vdha_3,351.56 //
GP12vd3343pu:829: atha vā bahunaitena kiṃ jñānena tavānagha /
GP12vd3343pu:830: viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśenāsthito jagat // Vdha_3,351.57 //
GP12vd3343pu:831: tad gaccha mānasī siddhiḥ sadā te 'stu dvijottama /
GP12vd3343pu:834: bhagavān nāradaś cakre pujāṃ taddeśavāsinām // Vdha_3,351.59 //
GP12vd3343pu:835: taiś ca saṃpūjito vipras tān praṇamya yatavrataḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:837: pādayor nyapatat tatra sa tayor munipūjyayoḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:838: tābhyāṃ saṃpūjito vipras tatrovāsa tadāśrame // Vdha_3,351.61 //
GP12vd3343pu:839: tataḥ kadācit taṃ vipram ūcatus tau tapodhanau /
GP12vd3343pu:840: āvābhyāṃ tvaṃ tathā dṛṣṭaḥ śvetadvīpagate 'cyutaḥ // Vdha_3,351.62 //
GP12vd3343pu:842: loke 'smin muniśārdūla nāsti dhanyataras tvayā // Vdha_3,351.63 //
GP12vd3343pu:843: dṛṣṭavān asi yad brahman viśvarūpadharaṃ harim /
GP12vd3343pu:845: yatas te 'nugrahas tena kṛto devena viṣṇunā /
GP12vd3343pu:846: tato guhyaṃ nibodhemaṃ tatpūjāvidhim uttamam // Vdha_3,351.65 //
GP12vd3343pu:848: nābhaktāya ca tad deyaṃ tvayā brāhmaṇasattama // Vdha_3,351.66 //
GP12vd3343pu:849: ekāntabhāvopagataṃ janārdanaṃ naras tu saṃpūjya tathā vidhānataḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:850: prayāti taddvīpam anuttamaṃ śivaṃ na yatra gatvā vinivartate punaḥ //
GP12vd3343pu:851: // iti śrīviṣṇudharmottare tṛtīyakhaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeyavajrasaṃvāde viśvarūpākhyānaṃ nāmaikapañcāśaduttaratriśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 351 //
GP12vd3343pu:852: naranārāyaṇāv ūcatuḥ ādāv eva saraḥsaritprasravaṇasamīpagṛhopavanaparvatamastakānām anyatame hṛdye deśe susamaṃ manoharaṃ hastamātraṃ maṇḍalakam upakalpayet // [Vdha_3,352.0.1] //
GP12vd3343pu:855: tataḥ padmakarṇikāmadhye śvetaṃ śatapatraṃ padmaṃ dhyāyet //
GP12vd3343pu:860: tanmadhye paraṃ puruṣam aśarīram agandham arasam arūpam asparśam aśabdaṃ sarvagaṃ plutāntaṃ oṃkāraṃ vinyaset // [Vdha_3,352.0.4]
GP12vd3343pu:869: aiśāne dale tad iti brahmāṇaṃ vinyaset /
GP12vd3343pu:874: prapūrvadvāre oṃ keṃ ṭeṃ yeṃ etāny akṣarāṇi vainateyaṃ vinyaset /
GP12vd3343pu:880: sveṃ ṭheṃ heṃ theṃ uttare dvāre aniruddhaṃ nyasyet /
GP12vd3343pu:882: veṃ ṇeṃ kṣeṃ kṣeṃ vidikṣu pāñcajanyaṃ śaṅkhaṃ nyaset /
GP12vd3343pu:884: dheṃ heṃ bheṃ heṃ śriyaṃ padmaṃ dakṣiṇato nyaset /
GP12vd3343pu:886: geṃ ḍeṃ veṃ śeṃ padmāntarataḥ puṣṭiṃ nyaset /
GP12vd3343pu:896: oṃ cheṃ ṭheṃ vāyavye kaustubhaṃ nyaset /
GP12vd3343pu:898: tato maṇḍale bāhyasthāṃ yathāsvadiśam okāraukārau (?) dikpatī śakrāgnī yamanairṛtavāruṇapavanakuberān aiśānyāṃ nyaset /
GP12vd3343pu:900_0: oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāyety antena dvādaśākṣareṇa karṇikāmadhye puruṣāyārghyapādyācamanīyānulepanapuṣpadīpadhūpamadhuparkanaivedyaphalabhakṣyāṇi
GP12vd3343pu:902: oṃ jitaṃ te puṇḍarīkākṣa namas te viśvabhāvana /
GP12vd3343pu:905: athānyān dalaniviṣṭān devān yathābhihitair mantraiḥ pṛthakpṛthag arcaye[t] // [Vdha_3,352.0.27]
GP12vd3343pu:906: anena vidhinā yas tu viṣṇum abhyarcayen naraḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:907: sarvān saṃsādhayed arthān kṛtakṛtyo hi jāyate // Vdha_3,352.1 //
GP12vd3343pu:908: kṛtvā vyādhiṃ vyā[dh]itaṃ bhakṣayati na karoti na tad āpnoti idaṃ tv anyat
GP12vd3343pu:911: ārogyaṃ dhanadhānyavardhanaṃ śatrughnaṃ vaśīkaraṇaṃ yaḥ puruṣo 'nena
GP12vd3343pu:912_0: vidhinā satataṃ devam abhyarcayati saṃpattiṃ janayati athavā tasya na rocate tadā śvetadvīpam avpyāpya arkamaṇḍalaṃ bhittvā
GP12vd3343pu:912_1: niruṇaddhi pradyumnasaṃkarṣaṇān prāpnoti sudevatvam avāpya niṣkalatvam āpnoti // [Vdha_3,352.2.2] //
GP12vd3343pu:913: // iti śrīviṣṇudharmottare tṛtīyakhaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeyavajrasaṃvāde nārāyaṇapūjanaprakāravarṇano nāma dvipañcāśaduttaratriśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 352 //
GP12vd3343pu:914: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca etad dhi nāradaḥ śrutvā naranārāyaṇeritam /
GP12vd3343pu:917: tataḥ puṃsavano bhagavān nāradasya mahātmanaḥ // Vdha_3,353.2 //
GP12vd3343pu:918: pratyakṣataḥ punar bhūtaṃ nāradaṃ vākyam abravīt /
GP12vd3343pu:919: gaccha nārada bhadra tvaṃ lokāṃś cara yathepsitān // Vdha_3,353.3 //
GP12vd3343pu:921: anugraham idaṃ prāpya deveśāt puruṣottamāt // Vdha_3,353.4 //
GP12vd3343pu:922: cacāra nārado lokān nityaṃ saṃpūjayan harim /
GP12vd3343pu:923: viśvarūpam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ nāradena mahātmanā // Vdha_3,353.5 //
GP12vd3343pu:925: tathā cāmṛtakādehe tenaiva ca mahātmanā // Vdha_3,353.6 //
GP12vd3343pu:926: brahmaṇā ca purā dṛṣṭaṃ t[r]ailokyākramaṇe punaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:927: paścime sāgare dṛṣṭaṃ daśagrīveṇa rakṣasā // Vdha_3,353.7 //
GP12vd3343pu:932: nivṛtte bhārate yuddhe gacchanto dvārakāṃ punaḥ /
GP12vd3343pu:933: mārgāgatena tad dṛṣṭam uttaṅkena mahātmanā // Vdha_3,353.10 //
GP12vd3343pu:935: tasya karṃāṇi yo nityaṃ puruṣaḥ parikīrtayet // Vdha_3,353.11 //
GP12vd3343pu:937: sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // Vdha_3,353.12 //
GP12vd3343pu:938: evaṃ sa rājan dvijavaryamukhyaḥ saṃprāptavān devavarāt prasādam /
GP12vd3343pu:939: bhaktikramakraiyanṛpaprasādāt tasmād dhi kāmān puruṣā labhante //
GP12vd3343pu:940: // iti śrīviṣṇudharmottare tṛtīyakhaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeyavajrasaṃvāde nāradaprasādo nāma
